channel.title: A New Private Server!
channel.description:
Hey Mopar Community,
I recently agreed to create a server with someone, but i feel he doesn't want it as much as i do, so i have created this thread to find someone who will team up with me and make a GOOD server.
I don't like anything like Czar, or traditional pk server Etc. I like original things. No portals everywhere and npcs shouting "OMG OWNER IS ONLINE". I don't like any of that. I was thinking we could probably use Richscape V2, a Dodian 6 base.
If you would like to team up with me please post with the form i applied to the bottom of the thread. I would love it if you were up for purchasing a domain for the server. I can install SMF probably, since we can't get Vbulletin because it is alot of money, but if you can purchase a domain i can install forums and Create a Webclient too.
So basically, all i want is someone who will not drive off this idea in a few weeks. I want someone who is dedicated to the server and at least knows some things.
[code=javascript] Name: MSN Address: Experience in programming: Able to purchase a domain: Web Design Experience (NOT NEEDED): Extra Information: [/code]
I look forward to your "Applications".
Thank you all.

item.title: A New Private Server!
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Name: maximalx5 (in game)
MSN Address: Ill pm you with it
Experience in programming: ive been coding for about 6 months now
Able to purchase a domain: nope
Web Design Experience (NOT NEEDED): not really
Extra Information: well i have my own server, im admin on 3 other servs, and mod on a lot of servs

Read full topic

item.title: A New Private Server!
item.dc:creator: @pkf0rl1f3 pkf0rl1f3
item.description:
@pkf0rl1f3 wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:3, topic:228076”][quote author=pkf0rl1f3 link=topic=299750.msg2406763#msg2406763 date=1219756915]
Name: Luke
MSN Address: You already got it
Experience in programming: Medium/Easy Stuff
Able to purchase a domain: No
Web Design Experience (NOT NEEDED): Alot
Extra Information: I like coding got about 1 week of spare time
[/quote]

Mhhmm u only got one week?
And no point having Web Design experience if we can’t get a website =D[/quote]

explained on msn

Read full topic
